titleStmt.title: You'l never get her up, or, Love in a tree. Being a pleasant new song, shewing how a maid was got with child, without lying with a man. To the tune of Buggering oats prepare thy neck.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby at the Golden Ball in Pye-Corner.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "A week ago as I did walk ..."
Date, place of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
